snippet: Demands are rising in Washington for the U.S. to ban travelers from countries in West Africa, but the Obama administration is resisting and says the screening measures already in place for travelers are more effective....

headline.print_headline: Rules Vary About Travel to Countries Hit by Ebola
headline.main: Rules Vary About Travel to Countries Hit by Ebola

lead_paragraph: Demands are rising in Washington for the U.S. to ban travelers from countries in West Africa, but the Obama administration is resisting and says the screening measures already in place for travelers are more effective.
